participant_1.background:
I like to wear comfortable, casual clothing when I'm watching TV or movies.
I love to spend time with my kids and show them my collection.
I love the outdoors and finding new ways to express myself.
I like to sit on my porch and watch the clouds go by.
I enjoy listening to jazz while I fly my model airplanes.

participant_2.background:
I cherish my collection of Celtics memorabilia, but my most valued possession is my garden.
I listen to the Beatles to lift my spirits.
I want to learn how to identify the different types of birds that live in my area.
i am a petsitter.
My favorite animal is the honey bee because they are so important to our ecosystem.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking. What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy gardening, listening to the Beatles, and spending time with my pets.
That's great! I love gardening too. What kind of plants do you have?
I have a lot of different kinds of plants, including flowers, vegetables, and herbs.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I wish I had a green thumb like you.
Thanks! It's not so hard, just takes a little time and patience.
I'm sure it does. I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I think I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also enjoy listening to music, watching movies, and reading.
That sounds great! I love all of those things too.
We have a lot in common!
It seems like we do! We should get together sometime and do something fun.
That would be great! I'd love to meet you in person.
Me too! We can exchange contact information and make plans.
